fields.summary: BitSet not computed properly for ColumnBuffer subset

comments.body: Table used for testing

[~xuefuz][~thejas]
Any comments on this issue.

Thanks [~bharatviswa] for raising the issue. I think we have a bug in computing subsets of the ResultSet. Specifically, we don't compute the null BitSet for each subset properly. Therefore we may get incorrect results in subsequent batches. I'll upload a patch to demonstrate the idea.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12844904/HIVE-15519.1.patch
